features: Durable performance: With a resistant stretch weave coated with a durable water-repellent finish(PFOA-free), this short is designed to last
Lasting comfort: The soft, slightly stretch weave make this 6-inch short really comfortable
Outdoor versatile: With strategic pockets and an adjustable waist, this short adapts to all your adventures
Zip fly: Zipped opening on a pant for easy on/off and when nature calls
Waist adjustment: Always a perfect fit with our infinitely adjustable waist adjustment. Can be adjusted individually to your waist size to discover pure freedom of movement
